hero.title: Quality, speed and results.
hero.subtitle: With more than 7 years of experience, we provide professional roofing solutions throughout Texas. At Boys Roofing we protect what you value most: your home and your peace of mind.
hero.experienceNote: More than seven years of experience back our commitment.

services.sectionSubtitle: Professional roofing with proven results. Quality and speed, without complications.

roofing.title: Roofing installation, repair and maintenance
roofing.p1: We are experts in residential and commercial roofing. We analyze your property, propose specific solutions and execute the work with precision and speed to protect your investment and your family.
roofing.p2: We work with certified materials, modern tools and a committed team to guarantee a resistant and professional finish.

cleaning.title: Cleaning and debris removal
cleaning.p1: A job is not finished until the area is clean and safe. We complete every project with cleaning and debris removal, leaving your property tidy and ready to use.
cleaning.p2: We collect, classify and remove waste generated during the work, reflecting our responsibility and respect for your space and the environment.

history.p1: Boys Roofing was born from the effort, dedication and desire to improve of its founder, who began his journey in the roofing world as a helper in a local company in Texas.
history.p2: Over the years, his passion for the trade, work ethic and commitment to quality led him to perfect his skills and deeply understand the needs of each client.
history.p3: When he realized that many people were looking for a more human, reliable and efficient service, he decided to found Boys Roofing with a clear intention: to offer roofing solutions based on quality, speed and proven results.
history.p4: Today, with more than seven years of professional experience, Boys Roofing is synonymous with commitment, trust and excellence, becoming one of the most recommended options in the state of Texas.
history.highlightText: More than a company, we are the reflection of a story of effort and determination, with a clear purpose: to protect your home and your peace of mind with a job well done.

missionVisionValues.missionText: Our mission is to offer top-quality professional roofing services, providing safe, durable solutions tailored to each customer. We work with efficiency, honesty and passion, guaranteeing results that exceed expectations.
missionVisionValues.visionText: To be recognized as one of the leading roofing companies in Texas, standing out for our integrity, service quality and commitment to total customer satisfaction.
valuesList: Commitment: we treat each project as if it were our own.
Quality: we use top materials and proven techniques.
Speed: we meet deadlines without sacrificing excellence.
Respect: we take care of your spaces as if they were ours.
Responsibility: every job is a fulfilled promise.
Teamwork: our success is built together.
